name: ContactSheetOptions
shortdesc: Options that can be specified for a contact sheet.

property.name: width
property.shortdesc: The width (in pixels) of the resulting document. Range: 100 to 2900.

property.name: height
property.shortdesc: The height (in pixels) of the resulting document. Range: 100 to 2900.

property.name: resolution
property.shortdesc: The resolution of the document (in pixels per inch). Range: 35 to 1200.

property.name: flatten
property.shortdesc: If true, flattens all layers in the final document.

property.name: acrossFirst
property.shortdesc: If true, places the images horizontally first.

property.name: useAutoSpacing
property.shortdesc: If true, auto spaces the images in the contact sheet.

property.name: columnCount
property.shortdesc: The number of contact sheet columns.

property.name: rowCount
property.shortdesc: The number of contact sheet rows.

property.name: vertical
property.shortdesc: The vertical spacing (in pixels) between images. Range: 0 to 29000.

property.name: horizontal
property.shortdesc: The horizontal spacing (in pixels) between images. Range: 0 to 29000.

property.name: bestFit
property.shortdesc: If true, rotates images for best fit.

property.name: caption
property.shortdesc: If true, uses the filename as a caption for the image.

property.name: font
property.shortdesc: The font used for the caption.
